titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: REVISED INTERNATIONAL STAGING SYSTEM STAGE FOR MULTIPLE MYELOMA - National Codes

strow.stentry: Stage l: International Staging System stage l and standard risk Chromosomal Abnormalities (CA) detected by Immunostaining-Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (iFISH) and normal lactate dehydrogenase (LDH)

stentry.p: Stage ll: Not Revised International Staging System for Multiple Myeloma (R-ISS) stage l or lll

strow.stentry: Stage lll: International Staging System stage lll and either high risk Chromosomal Abnormalities (CA) detected by Immunostaining-Fluorescence In Situ Hybridisation (iFISH) or high lactate dehydrogenase (LDH)
